caption.center: RANDY NORRIS, ET AL., Appellants, v. CHURCH COMPANY, INC., Respondent.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeals from judgments of the Superior Court for Clark County, No. 99-2-04405-7, James E. Rulli, J., entered March 31 and June 30, 2000.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed in part, reversed in part, and remanded by unpublished opinion per Seinfeld, J., concurred in by Hunt, A.C.J., and Houghton, J.Page 1051
